name: Cloudboy
description:
Click/tap to cause small gusts of wind! The closer you click, the more powerful the wind!

Push Cloudboy to walk safely on the cloud islands!

Don't let him fall too forcefully or HIS SOUL WILL EXPLODE

(edit, fixed mobile control input)
